body.name: Kimeesky Geometric Shag Modern Area Rug for Living Room Bedroom, 4x6 Distressed Moroccan Fluffy Rug Indoor Carpet for Kids Nursery Bedside Room Decor, Memory Foam Super Soft Shaggy Rugs, Grey/White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Attention】Kimeesky accent carpet is made of special and dense pile, which creates a vintage design distressed look and may have indentation after pressing on it. The shag moroccan area rug is vacuum-packed for shipping, it may be creased and may not be fluffy when you receive it, please lay it flat for 2-3 days, and the gray rugs will regain its flatness and fluffiness as shown on the pictures. If you have any questions, please contact us, we will reply within 24 hours

【Ultra Soft and Shaggy】 The moroccan fluffy shag rug features soft faux wool on the surface and thick memory foam in the middle layer, providing a soft and cozy touch for your feet like stepping on clouds, keeping your toes warm from the cold floor. You will love to move around and walk on the memory foam rug

【Non-Slip Design】 With thousands of non-slip rubber tips at the bottom, this 4x6 kids room rug stays securely in place, even on laminate floors, marble floors and hardwood floors, you can rest assured that the floor carpet will provide a safe and comfortable surface for your kids’ and pets’ playtime activities or for any daily use

【Easy Care】 With premium faux wool fabric, the indoor carpet ensures no shedding and is easy to clean. Daily cleaning with a low power vacuum cleaner or just a shake is sufficient to keep it clean and fresh. For deeper cleaning, you can either hand or machine wash the rug, then lay it flat to let it air dry. (Tips: Hand washing is recommended to preserve the softness and longevity of the living room carpet.)

【Classic Pattern】 The grey and white rug showcases a moroccan pattern, simple design and shaggy style make the moroccan fluffy rug a perfect complement to various interior design styles, such as modern, minimalist, retro, vintage, or preppy. The shag geometric modern area rug adds warmth and coziness to any indoor space and makes a thoughtful gift for your friends and family

【Room Decoration】The beside rug is available in various colors and sizes, making it suitable for any high-traffic area like living room, bedroom, bedside, playroom, dorm, home office, dining room, nursery, kitchen table, girls' room, boys' room, and classroom. When displaying 4 x 6 ft moroccan fluffy rug in different places, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the geometric rug, due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features Non Slip Rugs There are dense anti-skid tips in the bottom of the non slip carpet to prevent slippage, making the floor rug suitable for families with children and pets. Non Shedding Area Rugs The upgraded soft and dense fiber is firmly embedded on the surface of the rug for bedroom, and will not fall off, which makes it a nice decorative soft area carpet for high traffic areas. Soft Faux Wool Carpets Features soft faux wool on the surface and thick memory foam in the middle layer, keeping your toes warm from the cold floor. Moroccan pattern design increases the fashion sense of the carpet, bring more warmth and comfort.

Warm tips: If you want to make your area rug look more beautiful, you can refer the following step Step 1: Rolling the area rug, pattern side up, massaging the creases with your hands. We suggest leaving it reverse rolled for 2-3days before unrolling it again Step 2: You can use heavy objects like books to flatten your rug’s problem areas Step 3: Flip the big living room area rugs over and use a garment steamer or steam mop on the middle temperature to flatten the creases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So soft and fluffy!!! Comes in a small package, not a big roll like most rugs, so it’s super easy to unfold and lay flat without it rolling back up. Takes about 2 days for it to fully expand and get softer.

reviews.reviewerName: The hair is nice and soft. Had a slight smell to it but overall it’s a good product. There’s minimal to no shedding and definitely full.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used this carpet for my living room floor it’s very soft. When you lay it down though there are little air bubbles in the top of the rug but other than that it’s doing its job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars -1 stars Black isn’t a good option
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got the rug for my living room it was posed to be like a jet black however it’s more gray ish black! It gave blanket when I opened it! Not to happy with this purchase but don’t feel like the hassle of returning it so it’ll be used!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: loved the rug but this color was lighter than what was pictured so i sent it back and got the darker one and i love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is softer than I expected. Bought for my 1 year old to move around on something soft. Great for the price but definitely not high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gray & White Short Shag 4x6 Rug
reviews.reviewText: This 4x6 rug is soft with gray & white colors. The pattern is consistent and adds style to any room. A couple of stains were easy to remove with a cotton towel and water as it was also easy to move around. It instantly upgrades any area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not same as picture
reviews.reviewText: Rug is a lot lighter in color and too thin, not supposed to slide but it does . Feels more like a blanket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as dark black as shown. Looks grey.
reviews.reviewText: Liked it. Thick and foam. Great for kids and pets in the rec room.
